title: The Soup Cup
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Indian, International, Italian, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves 8 quick-serve classically handcrafted soups prepared in-house from scratch daily. Also serves Belgian fries with assorted dipping sauces and grilled cheese sandwiches. Offers some vegan, gluten and lactose free soups, all labeled on menu. The free bread that comes with the soup isn't vegan. Additional cuisines are Thai, Japanese, American and Chinese.
